document.heading: DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA GOVERNMENT COMPREHENSIVE MERIT PERSONNEL ACT OF 1978 SECTION 401(A) TRUST FUND AMENDMENT ACT OF 1990

history.narrative: Law 8-220 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 8-558, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 4, 1990, and December 18, 1990, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 27, 1990, it was assigned Act No. 8-303 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
